channel.title: NPC dialogue please help me

item.title: NPC dialogue please help me
item.dc:creator: @lollie lollie
item.description:
@lollie wrote:

does someone know a little bout NPC dialogues?

i used aubury for this atm but i wanted to use NPC ID (2409)

this is what i got at the moment:

case 3: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Do you want me to take you to 1 of the other train depots?", 4885); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

case 4: sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460); sendFrame126("Yes please!", 2461); sendFrame126("no thx,maybe later.", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

i want to have another 2 dialogues when you press yes please

like this :

varrock (tele to varrock)

lumbridge (tele to lumbridge)

more… (shows next dialogue)

ardougne (tele to ardougne)

falador (tele to falador)

never mind (close dialogue)

i hope some 1 knows what i must make as code to get this and if you know how to change aubury to NPC 2409 could you learn it me 2? ps from full codes i learn to aslong as i get a little explanation so i don’t have to ask again

Read full topic
